openconsensus.stats

Class StatsRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • openconsensus.stats.StatsRecorder

  • public abstract class StatsRecorder
extends Object
    Provides methods to record stats against tags.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatsRecorder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void record(List<Measurement> measurements)
      Records all given measurements, with the current Tagger.getCurrentTagMap().
      abstract void record(List<Measurement> measurements, TagMap tags)
      Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap.
      abstract void record(List<Measurement> measurements, TagMap tags, SpanContext spanContext)
      Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap.

    • Method Detail

      • record

        public abstract void record(List<Measurement> measurements)
        Records all given measurements, with the current Tagger.getCurrentTagMap().
        Parameters:
        measurements - the list of Measurements to record.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • record

        public abstract void record(List<Measurement> measurements,
                            TagMap tags)
        Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap.
        Parameters:
        measurements - the list of Measurements to record.
        tags - the tags associated with the measurements.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • record

        public abstract void record(List<Measurement> measurements,
                            TagMap tags,
                            SpanContext spanContext)
        Records all given measurements, with an explicit TagMap. These measurements are associated with the given SpanContext.
        Parameters:
        measurements - the list of Measurements to record.
        tags - the tags associated with the measurements.
        spanContext - the SpanContext that identifies the Span for which the measurements are associated with.
        Since:
        0.1.0
